Basic Information.name: Unique ID
Basic Information.help: Global unique ID of this object.

Basic Information.name: Unique Name
Basic Information.help: Global unique Name of this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner ID
Basic Information.help: ID of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Owner Group ID
Basic Information.help: ID of group of user who creates this object.

Basic Information.name: Original Object ID
Basic Information.help: ID of source object of this object, if this object is a copy of an existing object.

Basic Information.name: Child Object IDs
Basic Information.help: ID of all child objects, if this object is a container object.

Basic Information.name: Date and Time of creating
Basic Information.help: Date and Time of creating.

Basic Information.name: Status
Basic Information.help: Status of this object (active, inactive, ...)

Basic Information.name: ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter a unique identifier used in your lab.

Basic Information.name: Description
Basic Information.help: Please enter detailes about this substance.

Basic Information.name: Additional Files
Basic Information.help: Please enter additional files.

Basic Information.name: Molecular Weight
Basic Information.help: Please enter the molecular weight of the substance.

Basic Information.name: Molecular Formula
Basic Information.help: Please enter the molecular formula of the substance. Example: C5H9O4N

Basic Information.name: Structural Formula
Basic Information.help: Please enter al link or attach a file with the structural formula of the substance.

Basic Information.name: CAS Number
Basic Information.help: Please enter the CAS-Number of the substance. Example: 7665-99-8

Basic Information.name: Distributor
Basic Information.help: Please enter the name of the distributor (lab, company), from whom the substance was obtained. Place a link which leads directly to the product on the distributorâ€™s webpage.

Basic Information.name: Distributor Product ID
Basic Information.help: Please enter the product number of substance.

Basic Information.name: Lot Number
Basic Information.help: Please enter the lot number.

Basic Information.name: Purity / Grade
Basic Information.help: Please enter the purity or grade of the substance. Example: spectral purity, >99%

Basic Information.name: Verification
Basic Information.help: Please indicate the methods used to verify the purity. Upload the results of the analysis if available.

Basic Information.name: Date of Receive
Basic Information.help: Please enter the date, when the substance was received.

Basic Information.name: Stock Solution
Basic Information.help: If the entire batch was used to prepare a stock solution the volume of the added solvent and the final concentration should be added here.

Additional Information.name: Contact Person
Additional Information.help: Please enter the names and departments of the contact persons or principal investigators who are responsible for this entry and should be contacted for further questions.

Additional Information.name: Aliquots Sent To
Additional Information.help: Please enter when and to whom aliquots have been sent.

Additional Information.name: Notes
Additional Information.help: Please enter and link all further information which is important to the substance.
